mean_cn: n. 伸长，伸长率，延伸率
mean_en: an addition to the length of something
word_etyma: e出来 + long长+ ation名词后缀→ elongation 伸长
sentence: The elongation of the bungee cord allows him to fall a long way, but not get hurt.
sentence_trans: 蹦极绳索的伸长使他能跳得更远并且不受伤害。
sentence_phrase: The elongation of the bungee cord
